extension.name: plg_content_vyty_checkin
extension.author: Vyty.com
extension.description:
Vyty Check-In is a plugin that gemify your site by adding a check-in button on your web pages. It will help you to increase the engagament of your readers.

Download more gamification extensions

Please, vote for the plugin on Joomla! Extensions Directory

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: The position where you want to put buttons.

field.name: showInArticles
field.label: Show in articles
field.description: Display the buttons in the view 'article'.

field.name: showInCategories
field.label: Show in categories
field.description: Display buttons in the view 'category' and format 'blog'.

field.name: excludeCats
field.label: Exclude categories
field.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of categories.

field.name: excludeArticles
field.label: Exclude articles
field.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of articles.

field.name: includeArticles
field.label: Display in that articles
field.description: Displays the buttons in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. You must enter the IDs of articles.

field.name: checkinButton
field.label: Check-in Button
field.description: Show or hide the check-in button.

field.name: checkinImpCode
field.label: Implementation Code
field.description: Put the implementation code. That is the code that initialize the widgets. If the code has been installed, it is not necessary to put the code again.

field.name: gameId
field.label: Game Id
field.description: Enter the ID of the game.

field.name: checkinLayout
field.label: Check-In Layout
field.description: Select the layout of the check-in button.
